data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Musandam, Oman will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Musandam, Oman
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 28,200 souls in Musandam and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Over 97.15 percent of the people of Musandam are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, please raise up prophets in Musandam who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Bathari people might believe through him.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Musandam to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Musandam, Oman need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 184 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
